## Classes

### <a name="nfs"></a>`nfs`

Class: nfs

This class manages the configuration and service for NFS (Network File System).
add option RPCSVCGSSDOPTS="-n" to fix startup of service rpc-svcgssd on debian hosts

Parameters:
  None

Example Usage:
  class { 'nfs': }
